level.heading: Cooperation with federal government and states.
level.text: Except as provided in section 28-4505(k), the Corporation Counsel may cooperate with the federal government and the states in the enforcement of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-169
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-169, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 28-4501.
